TopicTitle: Is there currently anyway to rescale the Kerbin system? in 1.7.2?

Articles.Content: As the title says, is there anyway to rescale the Kerbin system for 1.7.2? Kopernicus is not current and every rescale mod I have found requires it so I think I'm stuck until Kopernicus gets updated.
I don't think they plan to support 1.7.2, as 1.7.3 came a month later with a lot of fixes. And there's a release for 1.7.3

15 minutes ago, Lisias said:

I don't think they plan to support 1.7.2, as 1.7.3 came a month later with a lot of fixes. And there's a release for 1.7.3

Thanks, I totally missed the fact that Kopernicus was updated to 1.7.3. Guess I can update my game and then get that and do a rescale.
